price: 59. (Allen) behalve de familie van Loeth. Hen zullen wij allen beslist redden.
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
